channel.title: about on Marium Tapal
channel.description: Recent content in about on Marium Tapal

item.title: about
item.description: I am an undergraduate student at Smith College double majoring in Statistical and Data Sciences (SDS) & Mathematics expected to graduate in May 2022. I have a passion for data science and engineering where I leverage my technical knowledge with extensive transferable and interpersonal skills to develop and improve tools used in industry. I am an R enthusiast: I co-wrote of the fec16 R package. This summer, I am working with Professor Albert Y.
